meanings.definition: In a way that is open to discussion or argument.
meanings.sent1: The decision was debatably made by the committee.
meanings.sent2: They debatably agreed on the best course of action.
meanings.sent3: The cat debatably claimed the sunny spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: Her smile debatably lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the kitchen debatably.

meanings.sent1: He is debatably the fastest runner on the team.
meanings.sent2: The movie debatably had the best special effects of the year.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel debatably outsmarted the clever fox.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone debatably brighter than ever before.
meanings.sent5: The cake tasted debatably delicious with its rich chocolate flavor.
